#summary This page describes the system requirements.

= Introduction =

This page describes the system requirements.

= Details =

 *  Web widget can be embedded in any web page.
 * Widget should suggest bookmarks related to the context of page.
 * Widget should allow user to provide feedback on the relevance of the suggested bookmarks.
       # User can vote to "sink" a bookmark. 
       # User can also rate a bookmark on the scale of 5.
 * The maximum number of bookmarks that are displayed is configurable.
 * Widget will contain collapsible list of bookmarks
 * The system should be scalable to manage sufficiently large number of requests
 * Widget will display popularity and recentness of the suggested bookmarks
